Lucent Technologies, Inc. is a company that provides Software, Telecommunications, Private network and more. Lucent Technologies, Inc. is headquartered in United States New Jersey. Lucent Technologies, Inc. has a total of 25,722 patents

What technical fields has Lucent Technologies, Inc. researched?

Lucent Technologies, Inc. has researched the technical fields related to SoftwareTelecommunicationsPrivate networkComputer hardwareInformation technologyData processingComputer programming

What is Lucent Technologies, Inc.'s total number of patents?

Lucent Technologies, Inc. has 25,722 patents in total.

How many employees does Lucent Technologies, Inc. have globally?

Lucent Technologies, Inc. has 29800 employees worldwide.

What kind of company is Lucent Technologies, Inc.?

Designs and builds a wide range of public and private networks, communications systems and software, and data networking systems, as well as telephone...

What is Lucent Technologies, Inc.'s stock symbol?

Lucent Technologies, Inc.'s stock symbol is LU.

Where is Lucent Technologies, Inc.'s headquarters?

Lucent Technologies, Inc. is located in New Jersey, United States.

What is Lucent Technologies, Inc.'s NAICS code?

Lucent Technologies, Inc.'s NAICS:NYSE.

How many offices does Lucent Technologies, Inc. have?

Lucent Technologies, Inc. has 4 offices.

Where are Lucent Technologies, Inc. offices?

Lucent Technologies, Inc. has offices in Georgia, United States; California, United States; Herefordshire, United Kingdom; Massachusetts, United States and in 4 other locations.
